thread.title: Save on online prep courses for the GMAT and LSAT — and more of today's best deals
thread.title_full: Save on online prep courses for the GMAT and LSAT — and more of today's best deals

author: Mara Leighton (feedback@businessinsider.com)
title: Save on online prep courses for the GMAT and LSAT — and more of today's best deals
text:
print 
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a small share of the revenue from your purchase. 
Since you don't have all day to scour the web for noteworthy sales and discounts, we rounded up the best bargains for you to shop in one convenient place. 1. Take 20% off test prep plans for the LSAT, GMAT, and more 
Flickr / Alberto G. 
Like many aspects of education, taking tests like the MCAT and GMAT are expensive, and some of those tests have limitations on how many times candidates can take them, putting on added pressure to do well the first time around. 
Compounded with time and money, it pays to do well as soon as possible, and test preps are an essential way of preparing in the best and smartest way. 
Fortunately, Magoosh has discounted all of their test prep plans by 20% until midnight on February 27. Just use the promo code " PREPSMART " at checkout. 2. Enroll in thousands of online courses for $10 each 
Udemy 
Virtually any topic you could think of is represented at Udemy . If you've wanted to learn how to code or build your own personal brand, it's a great time to invest; they're as cheap as they'll ever be. 
Just apply the promo code " BREAKTHRU " at checkout and the price of the course will be knocked down from around $200 to just $10.
